title.rendered: Sudbury Airport in Ontario, Greater Sudbury, Canada

content.rendered:
Verified & Updated on: 11/02/21

Sudbury Airport in Ontario, Greater Sudbury, Canada Address, Phone number, Lost and Found contact

Sudbury Airport Ontario, Greater Sudbury Address: 5000 Air Terminal Drive, Suite T202
Garson, Ontario P3l 1v4

Phone number: 1-705-693-2514

Toll-free: 1.855.FLY.2YSB Canada and U.S. Only

Email: airport@flysudbury.ca

Business hours: Monday To Sunday: 4:30am To 12:00am

Sudbury Airport Official website: http://www.flysudbury.ca/

Sudbury Airport Facebook :https://www.facebook.com/flysudbury/

IATA code: YSB

ICAO code: CYSB

WMO: 71730

Facilities and Services at Sudbury Airport

  • Food and Beverage
  • Free WiFi
  • Free Charging Stations
  • Car Rentals
  • Parking

Lost and Found – Sudbury Airport

If you lost or received items inside or outside the air terminal building and in the parking areas of the airport, Please contact information booth located in the arrivals area of the terminal.
Phone: 1-705-693-3828

Car Rental Services at Sudbury Airport

AvisEnterpriseNational
Avis  Tel: 1-705-693-4022, Toll Free:1-800-879-2847 Website
Enterprise Tel: 1-705-639-9993, Toll Free:1-800-736-8222 Website
National Tel: 1-705-693-5833, Toll Free: 1-800-227-7368 Website

Limousine Service at Sudbury Airport

Nite Lite Limousine
Nite Lite Limousine  Tel: 1-705-560-5466 Website

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Sudbury Airport in Ontario, Greater Sudbury Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.
